name: MSCRMGetConfigurationRecord
description: Retrieves a configuration entity record value using a lookup from a PowerApps/CDS/Dynamics 365 environment
author: Wael Hamze
helpMarkDown: Retrieves a configuration entity record value using a unique lookup value

inputs.name: entityName
inputs.label: Entity Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The entity logical name to upsert. (i.e. prefix_config)

inputs.name: lookupFieldName
inputs.label: Lookup Field Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the field used to lookup the record. (i.e. prefix_key)

inputs.name: valueFieldName
inputs.label: Value Field Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the field containing the value to you want to retrieve (i.e. prefix_value)

inputs.name: lookupValue
inputs.label: Lookup Value
inputs.helpMarkDown: The value that uniquely identifies a configuration record

inputs.name: existsVariableName
inputs.label: Exists Variable Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the pipeline variable to be populated with true if record exists

inputs.name: valueVariableName
inputs.label: Value Variable Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the pipeline variable to be populated with the value of the record

OutputVariables.name: RECORD_EXISTS
OutputVariables.description: Returns true if the configuration record exists

OutputVariables.name: RECORD_VALUE
OutputVariables.description: The value of the configuration record
